title: Improve microphone animation, reduce input padding, restore button labels

requirements.summary: Change the microphone button's rotating ring animation color to theme blue (--color-primary)
acceptanceCriteria: The rotating border animation on the microphone button uses the theme's blue color
The animation color matches the primary theme color used throughout the app

file_operations.description: Update the microphone button's rotating ring animation to use the theme's primary blue color (--color-primary). Locate the recording state UI where the rotating border animation is rendered (likely using CSS classes or inline styles with animation properties) and change the border or animation color to reference the CSS custom property var(--color-primary) from the theme system defined in frontend/src/index.css.

requirements.summary: Reduce vertical padding in the MessageInput component to make it more compact
acceptanceCriteria: The chat input area has less vertical padding than before
The input area appears more compact while remaining usable

file_operations.description: Reduce the vertical padding (py-* classes or padding styles) on the MessageInput component's container or wrapper elements. Look for padding applied to the main input area container and decrease the values to make the component more compact while preserving usability and touch targets for mobile users.

requirements.summary: Restore text labels for the react and reply buttons on message bubbles
acceptanceCriteria: React button displays a visible text label
Reply button displays a visible text label
Labels are visible and readable on message bubbles

file_operations.description: Add text labels to the react and reply buttons that appear on message bubbles. Locate the button elements for reactions and replies (likely icon-only buttons currently) and add visible text labels such as 'React' and 'Reply' alongside or near the icons. Ensure the labels are styled appropriately for readability and don't disrupt the existing layout.
